Elementary Education (K-6) & Early Child.1: Make content knowledge accessible to all students across content areas including language arts, science, math, social sciences, and the arts.
Elementary Education (K-6) & Early Child.2: Design and deliver effective instruction using formative and summative assessments.
Elementary Education (K-6) & Early Child.3: Create and maintain a safe, respectful, productive, classroom learning-environment for all learners.
Elementary Education (K-6) & Early Child.4: Integrate technology and new literacies to enhance learning across the curriculum.
Elementary Education (K-6) & Early Child.5: Apply knowledge of student development, diversity, language, and special needs  to differentiate instruction.
Elementary Education (K-6) & Early Child.6: Engage in continual informed reflective practice both individually and through collaboration with colleagues and professionals.
